detail_desc: Sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a round neckline and long raglan sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline with pleats front and back, and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.

Shirt in soft, lightweight cotton flannel with a collar and buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, an open chest pocket and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped top in a patterned weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with a tie detail at the front, and a smocked back.
Lace tights with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft, slub cotton jersey with short sleeves in a broderie anglaise weave. Narrow ribbing around the neckline and a tie detail at the front of the hem.

Playsuit in soft, patterned jersey with a V-neck front and back, wrapover front and ties at the back. Short sleeves with gathers at the shoulders, a seam at the waist with smocking at the back, and short, wide legs.
Scarf in soft, gently draping cashmere with fringes along the short sides. Size 32x170 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Fine-knit all-in-one suit in soft organic cotton. Jersey-lined hood with ears on the top, long raglan sleeves and buttons down the front. Opening with buttons down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y). Jersey lining.
Blouse in a soft textured cotton weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and frill-trimmed cap sleeves.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides with decorative narrow straps, and a string back.
Wrapover top in jersey with a V-neck, seam and detachable tie belt at the waist and long, cuffed sleeves.
Pyjama top and shorts in soft, ribbed cotton jersey. Top with a rib-trimmed neckline and short sleeves with overlocked edges. Shorts with covered elastication at the waist and overlocked hems.
Umbrella in transparent, printed plastic with a plastic handle. Length 77 cm.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a suede flap, concealed magnetic fastener, narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Fabric lining. Size 5.5x16.5x22 cm.
Skirt in washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front pockets and a raw-edge flounce at the hem.
Socks in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads.
Short necklace of thin metal chain with a pendant and long chain at the front. Adjustable length, 38-45 cm.
Sleeveless top in softly draping satin. Double layer at the top with a draped collar.

Playsuit in a softly draping viscose weave with a deep V-neck with ties at the front, and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck. Wide, 3/4-length sleeves, a narrow elasticated seam at the waist and lace trims around the sleeves and hems. Unlined.
Short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a stand-up collar and straight hem.
Jacket in faux fur with a zip down the front, jersey-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top, patch front pockets and an elasticated hem. Jersey lining.

Blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, sewn on ties in a contrasting colour around the neck, and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke at the top with gathers to create a lightly pleated effect, and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Seam at the front with frills, long sleeves, buttoned cuffs with a small frilled trim, and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Jetted front pockets, decorative slits at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in a slightly stretchy weave with an A-line skirt. Narrow shoulder straps, buttons down the front, a seam at the waist and diagonal side pockets.
V-neck, long-sleeved jumper in boiled wool in a straight-cut relaxed fit with ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline and a rounded hem.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with lace trims. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Short-sleeved top. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short, fitted dress in velour with faceted sparkly stones and plastic beads. Round neckline, long sleeves and a concealed zip and hook-and eye fastening at the back. Lined.
Top in a softly draping weave with a V-neck front and back and spaghetti shoulder straps. Lined. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Metal earrings with narrow hoops and a round pendant with a plastic stone at the bottom. Length approx. 4 cm.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with a wide elasticated flounce at the top.
Short, wide shorts in a crinkled weave with a high waist with pleats and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, relaxed-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, tapered legs and narrow, raw-edge, frayed hems with worn details.
Padded gilet with a detachable hood, stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and side pockets. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
High-waisted 5-pocket jeans in washed, coated stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in sturdy organic cotton jersey crêpe with a hood and concealed press-studs at the top. Kangaroo pocket, ribbed cuffs and slits in the sides.

Track jacket in sturdy jersey with a mesh-lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and mesh-lined side pockets with a taped zip. Unlined.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with roll-edge ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and medium coverage at the back.
Knee-length shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a wide flounce at the hem.

Leggings in washed superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details with patches on the inside. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
Leggings in extra sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short fitted top in viscose jersey with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front panel with a knot detail at the hem.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs down the front and along one leg.
Fitted, calf-length dress in a soft rib knit with a V-neck front and back.
Hat in a soft rib knit with faux fur pompoms on top.
Trainers with hook and loop fasteners at the top and a lightly padded edge around the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif.
Bikini bottoms with a low waist, lined gusset and ties at the sides. Medium coverage at the back and laser-cut, scalloped edges.
Metal rings in various designs.

Fully lined sports bra in extra-sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric that shapes and sculpts the bust. Removable inserts, a racer back and a wide, double-layered hem with a scalloped edge. Extra firm support.
Jazz trousers in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Tie in a patterned cotton weave. Width 5.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with picot trims around the neckline and armholes. Sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Wellingtons with a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.

Shirt in a cool pima cotton weave with a pointed collar, patterned yoke and classic front. Wide pleat at the back to create volume. Long sleeves with an opening at the cuffs, and wide cuffs with adjustable buttons. Rounded hem.
Cardigan in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.
Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a round neckline and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Dress with a sewn-in bodysuit in organic cotton jersey, short raglan sleeves and skirt in a textured weave with broderie anglaise and a scalloped trim. Buttons at the back and press-studs at the crotch.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a high waist, lined gusset and laser-cut edges. The briefs have a light sculpting effect on the waist, bum and hips.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib-knit cashmere blend with a double-layered turtle neck, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Padded ski jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with folded seams. Detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and a hook and loop tab at the back. Zip down the front, zipped front pockets and a zipped lift card pocket on one sleeve. Adjustable hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Short top in soft, pleated jersey with a sheen. Narrow ribbed trim around the neckline, short sleeves with overlocked edges and an overlocked hem.
Cap in woven fabric with a motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in washed cotton denim with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a back pocket.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in the side. Soft linings and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
